Description: Pottery ostracon with ten lines of text written in Corrupt Greek.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.15, pl.12)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (65436) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/65436)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Gr. I 12:2 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2013)
